recipes.recipeDescription: Saut√© onion, garlic, and ginger. *Add chicken and curry powder. *Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk. *Simmer until chicken is cooked through. *Garnish with cilantro and serve.

recipes.recipeIngredients: 1 cup flour * 2 eggs * 1 cup milk * 2 tbsp sugar * 1 tsp baking powder
recipes.recipeDescription: Mix all dry ingredients *Add eggs and milk, whisk until smooth *Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter * Cook until golden on both sides
